About Ember

About

Hi there! My name is Ember Padgett and I am a Computer Science student with a passion for coding, art, writing, and LGBTQIA+ activism.

I have a strong background in math, having taken Calculus 1-3, Proofs, Physics, and Combinatorics. I have used these skills for over 8 months at NetThunder, a startup in Chicago. In my free time, I enjoy writing and coding. I am currently working on improving my coding skills and am transferring from Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology to City College in New York City (Dec 2022).

Some of my interests include writing about LGBTQIA+, philosophy, and knowledge management. I am always open to exploring new things. Recently I've become aware of the Alignment problem in AI, and am spending significant personal time and energy researching this. In addition to my professional pursuits, I am also deeply committed to Stoicism and trying to always learn new things. I am extremely talented in seeing both sides of any argument.

I am excited to continue building my skills and making a positive impact in the world through my work with math and coding. Thank you for taking the time to learn more about me!
